body_html:
@codrut3, thank you very much for the contribution! This is indeed a nice change. Unfortunately, as you noted, the change relies on un-documented/un-officially supported feature of cuDNN; the future cuDNN may change this behavior and would break users silently. The change is also difficult to maintain, as the TF testing infrastructure needs to thoroughly test all cuDNN versions and various input sizes.

It seems un-safe to me to check in this change; we can certainly revisit this issue after cuDNN has official support on this.

Adding @zheng-xq
